name: The Path (itch) (Merly23)
description:
You play as Sophie on this adventure, a small girl of red clothing.  Your main goal is to follow the path ahead in an attempt to find the truth of why you are in this weird place.

Team: Merly23

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Esc to exit the game
  • Space to jump

In the game you only have three lives and death is permanent. You will have a score related to how many coins you collected and a death count related to how many times you died attempting to complete the game. Do you best and have fun!

This game is my first time ever solo and I had great fun. I made many mistakes and fixed a lot. The code is a mess but it still holds up to it's purpose.  The game as a whole is kind of bad and I apologise to any perfectionist.

Overall I liked making this game because it brought me the chance to develop my skills. Also I pushed my limits and learnt new stuff in all aspects of game dev. Thanks to this jam I motivated myself to bring this too.
